workflows.name: Reset Sync Status on Page Unload
workflows.description: Reset the sync status to 'idle' when navigating away from the page to ensure a clean state when returning to the page or viewing other drops.

workflows.name: Fetch MintCodes Count
workflows.description: Fetch the count of MintCodes for the current drop when page loads

workflows.name: Reset Sync Status on Page Change
workflows.description: Reset the sync status and error message when navigating away from the drop detail page

workflows.name: Refresh MintCodesCount on page load
workflows.description: Fetch the latest MintCodesCount data when the drop-mintcodes page is loaded. This script checks if the current page is 'drop-mintcodes' and if so, sets the loading state to true, fetches the collection data for MintCodesCount, and then sets the loading state back to false.

workflows.name: Fetch MintCodes on Page Load
workflows.description: Fetch the MintCodes collection from the database when the page loads to ensure the data is always up-to-date. This will prevent the data from getting stuck when navigating to this page.

workflows.name: Initialize Current Drop ID and Load Mint Codes
workflows.description: Gets the current Drop ID from the page URL or context and stores it in the currentDropId variable. Then calls fetchMintCodesForCurrentDrop with page 1 and the default page size to load the initial data.

workflows.name: Set Current Drop ID and Fetch MintCodes
workflows.description: Sets the current drop ID from the selected drop and fetches the MintCodes collection with reset option to ensure fresh data
